statements: SELECT * FROM LightBulbsInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT bulb_id, bulb_type FROM LightBulbsInventory WHERE last_restock_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bulb_id, quantity FROM LightBulbsInventory ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT bulb_type, quantity FROM LightBulbsInventory WHERE bulb_type = 'LED';
SELECT COUNT(bulb_id) AS total_bulbs FROM LightBulbsInventory;
SELECT * FROM LightBulbsInventory ORDER BY bulb_id DESC;
SELECT bulb_type, quantity FROM LightBulbsInventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT bulb_id, bulb_type, DATE_FORMAT(last_restock_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS restock_date FROM LightBulbsInventory WHERE last_restock_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM LightBulbsInventory;
SELECT bulb_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM LightBulbsInventory GROUP BY bulb_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM LightBulbs WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT brand, wattage FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage > 50;
SELECT id, brand, wattage FROM LightBulbs WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT * FROM Components WHERE type = 'LED';
SELECT name, quantity FROM Components WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage > 50 ORDER BY brand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand, wattage, quantity FROM LightBulbs WHERE quantity < 10 AND brand LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY wattage ASC;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM LightBulbs GROUP BY brand HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT brand, wattage, quantity FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY brand, wattage DESC;

SELECT l.brand AS light_bulb_brand, c.type AS component_type, l.quantity AS bulb_quantity, c.quantity AS component_quantity FROM LightBulbs l JOIN Components c ON l.brand = c.name WHERE l.quantity > c.quantity ORDER BY l.brand ASC, c.type DESC;
SELECT brand, wattage FROM LightBulbs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Components WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM Components WHERE quantity < 5 AND category = 'bulbs';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT lightbulb_id, maintenance_date, notes FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage > 75 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT Components.name, LightBulbs.brand FROM Components  JOIN LightBulbs ON Components.id = LightBulbs.id ORDER BY Components.name ASC;

SELECT LightBulbs.brand, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM MaintenanceRecords  JOIN LightBulbs ON MaintenanceRecords.lightbulb_id = LightBulbs.id GROUP BY LightBulbs.brand HAVING total_maintenance_records > 5;
SELECT brand, wattage, quantity FROM LightBulbs WHERE brand LIKE '%Philips%' AND wattage BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT Components.name AS component_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM MaintenanceRecords JOIN Components ON MaintenanceRecords.component_id = Components.id GROUP BY Components.name HAVING total_maintenance > 3 ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM light_bulbs;
SELECT brand, wattage FROM light_bulbs WHERE price < 50;
SELECT id, component_name, quantity FROM components ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT brand, price FROM light_bulbs WHERE wattage > 60 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM light_bulbs;
SELECT brand, price FROM light_bulbs WHERE wattage > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT components.component_name, components.quantity, maintenance_records.date FROM components JOIN maintenance_records ON components.id = maintenance_records.item_id;
SELECT technician, COUNT(replacement_date) AS replacement_count FROM replacements GROUP BY technician ORDER BY replacement_count DESC;
SELECT brand, wattage, price FROM light_bulbs WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY brand ASC, wattage DESC;
SELECT * FROM LightBulbs;
SELECT bulb_name, wattage, manufacturer FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage > 50;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_personnel = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT component_name, unit_price FROM Components WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT bulb_name, wattage, manufacturer, quantity FROM LightBulbs JOIN UsageLogs ON LightBulbs.id = UsageLogs.bulb_id WHERE UsageLogs.usage_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM LightBulbs WHERE wattage > 60 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT bulb_name, wattage, manufacturer FROM LightBulbs WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Lightings' AND wattage BETWEEN 40 AND 100 ORDER BY wattage ASC
SELECT component_name, type, unit_price FROM Components WHERE type = 'LED' ORDER BY unit_price LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_personnel = 'John Doe' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT bulb_id, component_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_personnel FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE bulb_id = 10 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
